videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: This is Mono Red  Deckmasters #2  The history of Red Aggro in MTG
videos.description:
The history of mono red aggro dates back to the Sligh deck in 1996.  RDW (Red Deck Wins) has been terrifying Magic: The Gathering tournaments ever since, even at the highest level Pro Tours.  It is particularly prevalent in BO1 MTG Arena ranked play, getting more players to Mythic than any deck in history.
